content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

a) Identify one significant scientific development of the late nineteenth century.
b) Explain one way in which scientific developments of the late nineteenth century challenged Europeans’ worldviews.
c) Explain one way in which changing European views of the world affected the arts.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
